ygData.subject: Re: Fish Scales
ygData.msgSnippet: While not exactly convenient, I go to Rivervale and kill trout in the river. I can usually muster up at least 20 scales an hour. Bernwyn ... From: Reece, Tom
ygData.messageBody:
While not exactly convenient, I go to Rivervale and kill trout in the river.
I can usually muster up at least 20 scales an hour.

Bernwyn


----- Original Message -----
From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, February 07, 2000 4:05 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Fish Scales


> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> I can't answer your question about bulk purchases but I do know a lot of
the
> the fishes you kill in Kedge drop fish scales so it shouldn't be hard for
> rangers/druids to replenish their supplies while they are down there.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> > The talk of Kedge Keep has me very interested and my Guild Leader
and
> > I've been planning an outing on ICQ. The question is; short of fishing;
> > where can Fish Scales be purchased in bulk?
> >
> >
